createpaymentinstrument.name: CreatePaymentInstrument
createpaymentinstrument.description: Grants permission to create a payment instrument

deletepaymentinstrument.name: DeletePaymentInstrument
deletepaymentinstrument.description: Grants permission to delete a payment instrument

getpaymentinstrument.name: GetPaymentInstrument
getpaymentinstrument.description: Grants permission to get information about a payment instrument

getpaymentstatus.name: GetPaymentStatus
getpaymentstatus.description: Grants permission to get payment status of invoices

listpaymentinstruments.name: ListPaymentInstruments
listpaymentinstruments.description: Grants permission to list payment instrument metadata

listpaymentpreferences.name: ListPaymentPreferences
listpaymentpreferences.description: Grants permission to get payment preferences (preferred payment currency, preferred payment method, etc.)

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags on a payment resource

makepayment.name: MakePayment
makepayment.description: Grants permission to make a payment, authenticate a payment, verify a payment method, and generate a funding request document for Advance Pay

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag a payment resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to untag a payment resource

updatepaymentinstrument.name: UpdatePaymentInstrument
updatepaymentinstrument.description: Grants permission to update a payment instrument

updatepaymentpreferences.name: UpdatePaymentPreferences
updatepaymentpreferences.description: Grants permission to update payment preferences (preferred payment currency, preferred payment method, etc.)
